entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as having pus-filled sores on her hands, which are painful. She tries to rub them off with a napkin but it's difficult due to the thickness of the sores.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as telling Hermione to go up to the hospital wing and that they will tell Professor Sprout where she has gone.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as reading out a letter from Rita Skeeter, warning Hermione not to annoy her. He also mentions that he warned Hermione about Rita Skeeter's curse.

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is described as sending a curse to Hermione, warning her not to play Harry Potter false and that he has had enough hardship.

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is mentioned as the person who will be told where Hermione has gone by Harry and Ron.

relationships.description: Rita Skeeter is sending a curse to Hermione, warning her not to play Harry Potter false and that he has had enough hardship.
Ron warned Hermione about Rita Skeeter's curse, but she didn't listen.
